TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi sealed beforefieldinit ComplexBindingPropertiesAttribute extends System.Attribute

Docs.summary: Specifies the data source and data member properties for a component that supports complex data binding. This class cannot be inherited.

remarks.format:
## Remarks The ComplexBindingPropertiesAttribute is used to specify the properties used with complex data binding, such as binding based on <xref:System.Collections.IList?displayProperty=fullName>.
The ComplexBindingPropertiesAttribute attribute is specified at the class level. It is inheritable and does not allow multiple attributes on the same class.
A control can support both simple binding, with <xref:System.ComponentModel.DefaultBindingPropertyAttribute>, as well as complex binding.
For more information about using attributes, see [Attributes](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md).
## Examples The following code example demonstrates using ComplexBindingPropertiesAttribute to identify a control's `DataSource` and `DataMember` properties for data binding. For a full code listing, see [How to: Apply Attributes in Windows Forms Controls](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md).
[!code-vb[System.ComponentModel.AttributesDemoControl#20](~/add/codesnippet/visualbasic/t-system.componentmodel._141_1.vb)] [!code-cs[System.ComponentModel.AttributesDemoControl#20](~/add/codesnippet/csharp/t-system.componentmodel._141_1.cs)]

MemberSignature.Value: .method public hidebysig specialname rtspecialname instance void .ctor() cil managed

Docs.summary: Initializes a new instance of the class using no parameters.

remarks.format: ## Remarks The default constructor sets the <xref:System.ComponentModel.ComplexBindingPropertiesAttribute.DataSource%2A> and <xref:System.ComponentModel.ComplexBindingPropertiesAttribute.DataMember%2A> properties to `null`.

MemberSignature.Value: .method public hidebysig specialname rtspecialname instance void .ctor(string dataSource) cil managed

Docs.param: The name of the property to be used as the data source.
Docs.summary: Initializes a new instance of the class using the specified data source.

remarks.format: ## Remarks This constructor sets the <xref:System.ComponentModel.ComplexBindingPropertiesAttribute.DataSource%2A> property to `dataSource` and the <xref:System.ComponentModel.ComplexBindingPropertiesAttribute.DataMember%2A> property to `null`.

MemberSignature.Value: .method public hidebysig specialname rtspecialname instance void .ctor(string dataSource, string dataMember) cil managed

Docs.param: The name of the property to be used as the data source.
The name of the property to be used as the source for data.
Docs.summary: Initializes a new instance of the class using the specified data source and data member.

remarks.format: ## Remarks This constructor sets the <xref:System.ComponentModel.ComplexBindingPropertiesAttribute.DataSource%2A> property to `dataSource` and the <xref:System.ComponentModel.ComplexBindingPropertiesAttribute.DataMember%2A> property to `dataMember`.

Docs.summary: Gets the name of the data member property for the component to which the is bound.
Docs.value: The name of the data member property for the component to which is bound

remarks.format: ## Remarks The DataMember property is set in the constructors for this class.

Docs.summary: Gets the name of the data source property for the component to which the is bound.
Docs.value: The name of the data source property for the component to which is bound.

remarks.format: ## Remarks The DataSource property is set in the constructors for this class.

Docs.summary: Represents the default value for the class.

remarks.format: ## Remarks The Default member is a static, read-only field that defines an instance of the <xref:System.ComponentModel.ComplexBindingPropertiesAttribute> class initialized with the default constructor.

MemberSignature.Value: .method public hidebysig virtual instance bool Equals(object obj) cil managed

Docs.param: The <xref:System.Object> to compare with the current instance
Docs.summary: Determines whether the specified <xref:System.Object> is equal to the current instance.
Docs.returns: if the object is equal to the current instance; otherwise, , indicating they are not equal.

remarks.format: ## Remarks The Equals method returns `true` if `obj` is of type <xref:System.ComponentModel.ComplexBindingPropertiesAttribute> and the <xref:System.ComponentModel.ComplexBindingPropertiesAttribute.DataSource%2A> and <xref:System.ComponentModel.ComplexBindingPropertiesAttribute.DataMember%2A> properties of the two objects are equal.
